source_name: Pelagic Longline Fishery for Albacore (Thunnus alalunga) in the Mediterranean Sea off Egypt

effort_models.name: Effort intensity 4000-4500 hook longline vessels
effort_models.documentation: Reported 110.9 +- 41.7 kg biomass per 1000 hooks per day

gear_models.name: Gear intensity for Thuunus alalunga Mediterranean longline
gear_models.documentation: 11-13m 1.2mm mainline + 5m 1mm branchline per hook. 4000-4500 hooks per line = 14-17m vessels = 70-130hp
